title.rendered: FXStreet Announces Launch of Trading Signals

content.rendered:
One of the world’s best known B2C online Forex news and media portals, FXStreet, has announced that it will begin to offer trading signals to help traders navigate the markets. The company will provide strategies incorporating price, time and market events, such as economic data releases.

Commenting on the news to Finance Magnates, Setxi Fernández, Chief Executive Officer at FXStreet said: “We want to keep on empowering our users to be more independent and informed when trading Forex. Our signals will help them decide when to enter and when to exit a position in a specific market.”

The trading signals can be found on the company’s website via the following link http://www.fxstreet.com/signals. At this time, we do not know if the new service will be available to all users, as it is currently only available for premium subscribers. Users will be glad to know that the signals will be generated automatically and real-time notifications will be available to alert traders or potential market moves.
